title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Building a maintenance strategy, Managing change, selection of maintenance tactics, Planning and scheduling resources, Measurement and bench marking of Performance MIS for maintenance, RCM, Total productive maintenance, reengineering maintenance process.
